name: Bug the glitched bug
description:
An angel has the job of putting the little antennae on the worms, but a bug occurs and it puts a horn... wanting to discard it, he sends the flying entities to destroy it when it escapes.

But our friend Bug was helped by God, who said that when you can use a bug to your advantage... it becomes a glitch! Bug can now face the flying entities to reach the earth and thus become a little creature of God.
